name: Airtame
notes: The number of screens is based on 10,000 organizations using Airtame

name: Displ
notes: The screen count is based on the number of provided connected locations. The actual screen count may vary.

name: MustHaveMenus
notes: The total number of screens is based on the number of restaurants

name: Mvix
notes: Perpetual license of hardware and/or software starting at $350 - no ongoing fees or monthly subsciption

name: NowSignage
notes: The screen count is based on the number of customers. The actual screen count may vary.

name: Nutrislice
notes: Empowering over 30,000 locations around the world

name: Pickcel
notes: The screen count is based on the number of provided connected locations. The actual screen count may vary.

name: Posterbooking
notes: We mention a minimum of 35000 connected screens based on customer count, but the actual number could be significantly higher.

name: Q-play
notes: The screen count is based on the number of customers. The actual screen count may vary.

name: Screenfeed
notes: Not fully digital signage software, but a content provider. Can be used in conjunction with other software.

name: Spectrio
notes: Total screens number based on global locations powered provided

name: truDigital
notes: Total screens is based on the number of active users

name: Valotalive
notes: Screen count is based on revenue.

name: Vivi
notes: Total sceens number based on the number of classrooms provided

name: Xibo
notes: Android, Tizen and webOS players are closed-source, commercial products.
